sidebar.para: The reconfigure process can be triggered again from the deployer. Presuming that changes have been made to the variables in the appropriate places execution of the respective ansible scripts will be enough to update the configuration. The spark reconfigure process alters the nodes serially meaning that spark is never down altogether, each node is stopped in turn and zookeeper manages the leaders accordingly. This means that monasca-transform may be left running even while spark is upgraded.
sidebar.screen: cd ~/scratch/ansible/next/hos/ansible ansible-playbook -i hosts/verb_hosts spark-reconfigure.yml ansible-playbook -i hosts/verb_hosts monasca-transform-reconfigure.yml
